## isAsyncFunction() function

检查值value是否是异步函数

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isAsyncFunction<T = any>(value: unknown): value is () => Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

value is () =&gt; Promise&lt;T&gt;

如果value等于Promise类型,那么返回true,否则返回false
